sentences.en: Arabia has been hit by soaring costs and project delays, as have oil companies elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 与其他地方的石油公司一样,沙特也遭遇了成本暴涨和项目延迟.

sentences.en: But there were notable increases from Saudi Arabia, Nepal and Vietnam.
sentences.cn: 而沙特 、 尼泊尔和越南的排名则有所上升.

sentences.en: But unlike Saudi Arabia, in Alberta the oil is literally in the sand.
sentences.cn: 但不同于沙特,正如其名, 艾伯塔的油是从砂中提取的.

sentences.en: For Saudi Arabia, the outlook appears bleak, however, with Spain still to come.
sentences.cn: 对沙特队来说,他们的世界杯前景看起来很暗淡, 不过与西班牙队的比赛还是要打的.

sentences.en: In Riyadh Saudi Arabia doctors successfully separated a pair of conjoined twins.
sentences.cn: 在沙特利雅得的一家医院,医生们成功分离了一对连体婴儿.

sentences.en: More open that is, than say Saudi Arabia.
sentences.cn: 更开放的意思是与沙特相比而言.

sentences.en: Mr Obama arrived in Egypt from a visit to Saudi Arabia.
sentences.cn: 奥巴马先生从对沙特的访问抵达了埃及.

sentences.en: Saudi Arabia's king has indicated that he thinks $ 75 a barrel would be fair.
sentences.cn: 沙特国王已经暗示他认为每桶75美元将是比较公平的价格.

sentences.en: Sounds on the picture is an Arabia night of deep pool!
sentences.cn: 听起来就像是天方夜潭!

sentences.en: The finance ministers of Norway and Saudi Arabia have no cause to worry about their borrowing costs because they are net creditors.
sentences.cn: 挪威和沙特阿拉伯的财政大员就没有理由担心他们的借贷成本，因为他们是净债权人。

sentences.en: They are running on Saudi Arabia Road.
sentences.cn: 现在他们正在沙特的路上运行.

sentences.en: THEY MUST FORGET THE FIRST DEFEAT AND WIN AGAINST SAUDI ARABIA.
sentences.cn: 他们必须忘记首场的失利,赢得对沙特的比赛.

sentences.en: This commentator claims Mt Sinai is in Arabia and is where Moses saw the burning bush.
sentences.cn: 这个评论家宣称西乃山是在亚拉伯,摩西是在这里看见燃烧着的荆棘.

sentences.en: Training The Ukrainian players know they need to improve against Saudi Arabia.
sentences.cn: 乌克兰的队员们知道他们必须在对沙特的比赛里有所改进.
